enumerations.name: TtcanTriggerType
enumerations.note: This type lists all trigger types for a time window. Aggregated by TtcanAbsolutelyScheduledTiming.trigger

literals.name: txRefTrigger
literals.description:
Send reference message in periodic case
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: txRefTriggerGap
literals.description:
Send reference message in event-synchronised case
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2

literals.name: txTriggerMerged
literals.description:
Send message in a merged arbitration window
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=3

literals.name: txTriggerSingle
literals.description:
Send message in an exclusive time window
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=4

literals.name: watchTrigger
literals.description:
Check for missing reference message in periodic case
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=5

literals.name: watchTriggerGap
literals.description:
Check for missing reference message in event-synchronised case
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=6
